Detailed Description

This class collects all vcs handling.

The VCS entries are read in from vcs.xml, this is done automatically during the first Get call.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxExVCS::wxExVCS ( const wxFileName &  filename  ) 

Constructor for vcs from specified filename.

This must be an existing xml file containing all vcs. It does not Read this file, however if you use the global Get, it both constructs and reads the vcs.

Member Function Documentation

int wxExVCS::BuildMenu ( int  base_id,
wxMenu *  menu,
const wxFileName &  filename = wxFileName(),
bool  is_popup = true 
)

Builds a menu, default assumes it is a popup menu.

Returns number of items in menu. Sets the files member if you filename is ok.

wxStandardID wxExVCS::ExecuteDialog ( wxWindow *  parent  ) 

Shows a dialog and executes the vcs command if not cancelled.

If no fullpath was specified, a dialog with base folder is shown, otherwise the specified fullpath is used for getting vcs contents from. Returns wxID_CANCEL if dialog was cancelled, an execute error occurred, or there is no output collected. Returns wxID_OK if okay (use GetError to check whether the output contains errors or normal info).

bool wxExVCS::IsOpenCommand (  )  const [inline]

Returns true if this command can behave like opening a file.

bool wxExVCS::Read (  ) 

Reads all vcs (first clears them) from file.

Returns true if the file could be read and loaded as valid xml file.

wxStandardID wxExVCS::Request ( wxWindow *  parent  ) 

Combines all in one method.

Calls the ExecuteDialog, and calls ShowOutput if return code was wxID_OK. Returns return code from ExecuteDialog.

static wxExVCS* wxExVCS::Set ( wxExVCS *  vcs  )  [static]

Sets the object as the current one, returns the pointer to the previous current object (both the parameter and returned value may be NULL).
